formatted_address: 3 St George's Rd, #01-67 St. George's, West Garden, Singapore 320003
name: Common Grill@ 3 St George's Road

reviews.text: In a convenient Coffee shop, great option for western food especially for children. $10.90 for this margarita pizza. Even the  Kirby’s fan is so in love with it. Felt expensive in the beginning but think half size is around $5. Okay, that’s cheaper than some places for that portion.

Take away for one item will cost you $0.60 additional , 3 items aldy $1.80 . See photo whats is the $0.60 packaging worthy of ~ also the $3.50 soup is so small portion ! not even half my finger high , what a joke. I will definitely not going back , eat at your own risk

This is one of the stalls where the picture is actually smaller than the portion. Food was decently cooked!  Very amazed and impressed. The staff was extremely friendly and price was not too expensive! Definitely buying again.
Came back and the staff was still as friendly! For the price, the food is decent but not to die for!

Ordered the signature crispy chicken.

Honestly damn shocked at how thin the chicken was. It was 80% batter 20% meat. First time see such a desperate attempt to cut costs. New low.

The food is fantastic! The price is worth as well for its huge portion. suggest everyone to come on weekday, as weekend is usually crowded and have to wait longer than usual. We waited for 15 mins for Our meals so I believe is still acceptable on a Friday night.

vicinity: 3 Saint George's Road, #01-67 St. George's, West Garden, Singapore
